channel.title: Disney on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Disney on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jared Leto is the ultimate solder in new TRON: Ares trailer
item.description: “He’s biblically strong, lightning fast, and supremely intelligent”—and very dispensable.

item.title: Joshua Jackson Is “Not Holding [His] Breath” That ‘Doctor Odyssey’ Will Return
item.description: The series star’s comments come after The Hollywood Reporter confirmed that the ABC show would not be embarking on a second season, even as the network maintains it hasn’t been canceled.

item.title: Joshua Jackson Is “Not Holding [His] Breath” That ‘Doctor Odyssey’ Will Return
item.description: The series star’s comments come after The Hollywood Reporter confirmed that the ABC show would not be embarking on a second season, even as the network maintains it hasn’t been canceled.

item.title: A Chat With Josh D’Amaro on Disneyland’s Future, Next Bets and an Animatronic Walt
item.description: The chairman of Disney Parks, Experiences and Products talks to THR about the impact the Anaheim park had on immersive entertainment on its 70th anniversary, and what the next evolution may be.

item.title: A Chat With Josh D’Amaro on Disneyland’s Future, Next Bets and an Animatronic Walt
item.description: The chairman of Disney Parks, Experiences and Products talks to THR about the impact the Anaheim park had on immersive entertainment on its 70th anniversary, and what the next evolution may be.

item.title: Disney’s New Haunted Mansion Collection Brings Madame Leota and More Ghouls to Life
item.description: Priced from $16.99 to $900, the 2025 line of ride-inspired merch includes spooky and chic clothing, accessories, jewelry, home goods, tableware, decor, art and more.

item.title: Disney’s New Haunted Mansion Collection Brings Madame Leota and More Ghouls to Life
item.description: Priced from $16.99 to $900, the 2025 line of ride-inspired merch includes spooky and chic clothing, accessories, jewelry, home goods, tableware, decor, art and more.

item.title: To make Ironheart feel tactile, the show’s creative team had to get on the same page
item.description: In Disney Plus’ Ironheart series, a young genius with an uncanny knack for building armored suits finds herself plunged into a shady, criminal underworld that gives her a chance to really show off her

item.title: The 54 Best Shows on Disney+ Right Now (July 2025)
item.description: Ironheart, Doctor Who, and Star Wars: Tales of the Underworld are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Disney+ this month.

item.title: Emmys: HBO and Max Score Most Nominations, Apple Takes a Big Bite
item.description: With a lot of help from ’The Penguin’ and ‘The White Lotus,’ HBO and its sibling streamer earned a record high number of nods for the two platforms.
